donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: The Model UN Project serves as a student's portal to international affairs and negotiation. The Model UN provides the youth of Albania with an opportunity to enhance their understanding on global and local development issues as well as championing the crucial ideals of human rights, volunteerism and equality in the society. This project supports also the development of skills in public speaking, debating, conflict-resolution, leadership and consensus building especially the empowerment of girl students and their future participation in public discourse.

donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The Model UN Project serves as a student's portal to international affairs and negotiation. The Model UN provides the youth of Albania with an opportunity to enhance their understanding on global and local development issues as well as championing the crucial ideals of human rights, volunteerism and equality in the society. This project supports also the development of skills in public speaking, debating, conflict-resolution, leadership and consensus building especially the empowerment of girl students and their future participation in public discourse.
